Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO REAL PROPERTY TAXATION

Title: Provides for a tax abatement for electric energy storage equipment
Summary: Provides for a tax abatement for electric energy storage equipment placed in service after January 1, 2026 and before January 1, 2028.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to providing a tax abatement for electric energy storage equipment
